column4: hello, my pc is a acer aspire 5738zg (laptop) 2.1 ghz intel t4300, ge force g105m 512mb and a 500 gb hd
i have a problem in every linux distro, it is allways slow
i am not sure why is that, my windows 7 runs fine, and ubuntu runs laggy
have you installed the appropriate graphics drivers for your video card?
